name: labyrinth Trials
description:
A game designed with the intend of speed running as the player you must fight monsters and robots and make your way through four stages and defeat all the bosses and make it to the end portal as quickly as possible
The player has multiple unlockable abilities such as double jump, the ability's to transform into a ball holding S and transform back holding W, dashing with right click and shooting while in standing form and dropping bombs in ball mode with left click.

Not sure where to do this so special thanks to all those who contributed to this I hope i Did your work proud
Sven Thotle
James Doyle
Ansimuz
penusbmic
